entry.summary:
Vendor: Sia
Type: PSA Discs
Price: 0.34

[shortdesc]
  • flexible and versatile
  • As a cost-effective all-round series for wet and dry sanding, 1948 siaflex produces outstanding results in all available grits and in a variety of automotive applications.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Sia
    Line Siaflex
    Backing Material Paper
    Color Blue
    Diameter 5 Inch
    Dimensions 5xNH
    Grit 120
    Material 1948
    Mineral Aluminum Oxide
    Product Type PSA Discs
    Vacuum Type Non-Vacuum

    Product Information

  • High stock removal with good finish
  • Highly flexible and adaptable to contours
  • Minimal clogging thanks to open coating in 220 - 600 grit range
  • Long lifetime
  • Suitable for general use in dry and wet sanding applications
  • Versatile all-round product with an attractive range of options

    • Suggested Application

  • Sanding down coatings and impurities
  • Sanding out unevenness at the edges of repaired surfaces
  • Flatting of body filler and primer filler
  • Fine sanding of primer filler
  • Keying old and new lacquers
  • Removing orange peel effect and dust inclusions

entry.title: Carborundum Premier Red 18113 - Self Adhesive Paper (PSA) Discs 5 Inch Material Aluminum Oxide in 800 Grit 05539518113
entry.summary:
Vendor: Carborundum
Type: PSA Discs
Price: 47.29

[shortdesc]
  • Best choice for sanding all paints, primers, plastics and fiberglass
  • Also suited for sealer and wash coats in wood furniture.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Carborundum
    Line Premier Red
    Backing Material Paper
    Diameter 5 Inch
    Dimensions 5xNH
    Grit 800
    Material Premier Red
    Mineral Aluminum Oxide
    Product Type PSA Discs
    Vacuum Type Non-Vacuum

    Product Information

  • P-graded, heat-treated, aluminum oxide abrasive provides 30% to 50% faster cut rate than other discs with consistent scratch pattern and finish
  • Unique fiber-reinforced, B-weight, latex-saturated backing provides a 50% – 60% improvement in tear strength, superior resistance to delamination
  • Special, undyed stearate oversize and an open coat provides superior load resistance and extended life with no color transfer to work
  • Pressure-sensitive adhesive backing for easy application and removal
    		•

entry.title: 3M Stikit AB96434 - 6 Inch x Non-Vacuum Gold 216U Aluminum Oxide 320 Grit Paper Disc 7000118111
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: PSA Discs
Price: 102.65

[shortdesc]

3M Stikit Gold Paper Disc Roll 216U, 6 in x NH P320 A-weight, 175 discs per roll 6 rolls per case

  • The 3M™ Stikit™ Gold Paper Disc Roll 216U is designed for convenience
  • Combining open coat aluminum oxide discs with a handy adhesive backing, the discs on this roll come ready for quick attachment to a 3M™ Stikit™ Backup Pad (sold separately)
  • The discs are easy to grab, eliminating the use of disc liners.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Stikit
    Color Gold
    Diameter 6 Inch
    Dimensions 6xNH
    Grit 320
    Material 216U
    Mineral Aluminum Oxide
    Origin Country Canada
    Product Type PSA Discs
    Vacuum Type Non-Vacuum

    Product Information

  • Convenient roll form means no liners to remove, increasing productivity
  • Aluminum oxide mineral is durable, cuts fast, and performs well on many surfaces
  • A-weight light paper backing is suitable for finishing applications
  • Open coat construction minimizes dust on the abrasive and workpiece for increased productivity
  • Load-resistant coating helps prevent premature loading of the disc surface to maximize cut and extend the life of the abrasive grains
    		•

entry.title: Sia SiaSpeed 6256.1639.0120 - Self Adhesive (PSA) Discs 6 Inch 1950 Material Aluminum Oxide in 120 Grit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sia
Type: PSA Discs
Price: 0.47

[shortdesc]
  • for a perfect finish at full speed
  • The versatile all-round product 1950 siaspeed is specially designed for high stock removal rates, perfect surface quality and long life in applications such as the surface treatment of body filler, primer filler, lacquers and paints.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Line SiaSpeed
    Backing Material Paper
    Color Pink
    Diameter 6 Inch
    Dimensions 6xNH
    Grit 120
    Material 1950
    Mineral Aluminum Oxide
    Product Type PSA Discs
    Vacuum Type Non-Vacuum

    Product Information

  • Very high stock removal rates and excellent finish
  • Performance-enhancing grit mix with ceramic corundum in 40 - 80 grit range
  • Minimal clogging thanks to open coating in 220 - 600 grit range
  • Extremely long lifetime
  • Available with innovative FiboTec multi-hole air chamber backing
  • Lower abrasive consumption
  • Versatile all-round product with an attractive range of options

  • Sanding down coatings and impurities
  • Sanding out unevenness at the edges of repaired surfaces
  • Flatting of body filler and primer filler

entry.summary:
Vendor: Sia
Type: PSA Discs
Price: 14.08

[shortdesc]
  • for optimal performance on softwood
  • 2920 siawood is ideal for manual sanding and belt sanding in plywood and softwood board production, and offers high stock removal rates, long life and excellent finish in coarse to fine sanding applications.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Sia
    Line SIAwood
    Backing Material Cloth
    Diameter 12 Inch
    Dimensions 12xNH
    Grit 50
    Material 2920
    Mineral Aluminum Oxide
    Product Type PSA Discs
    Vacuum Type Non-Vacuum

    Product Information

  • Perfect surface finishes thanks to TopTec
  • Dust-free process: antistatic construction gives low dust formation on belt, workpiece and machinery
  • Suitable for long periods of use thanks to very robust backing and optimised grit spreading technology
  • High removal rate when working on softwood and hardwood with coarser Grits

    • Suggested Application

  • Flush sanding of edges
  • Coarse sanding in plywood manufacturing
  • Intermediate sanding in plywood manufacturing
  • Coarse sanding of laminated softwood panels
  • Intermediate sanding of laminated softwood panels
  • Fine sanding of laminated softwood panels
  • Sand
